mods.abstract: Full face view of a male subject bust-length, who has a full beard and head of hair.
mods.note: the sponge-like quality of the artist's lines give the hair the illusion of being curly. The face is literally ringed with hair. The sitter has a long aquiline nose and deep-set, mystical eyes. The overall configuration of the face is classical.

name.namePart: Louisiana State University (Baton Rouge, La.). Museum of Art

titleInfo.title: Caroline Wogan Durieux Works of Art
